name: Emily vs the Unstable Creatures
description: Emily is a pizza delivery woman who got trapped in a lift while hordes of unstable creatures goes to the attack! What could be happening? A computer glitch? A nightmare? Or just stress from work? Poor Emily… for her lucky, perhaps, there is a mysterious little girl who can sell her heavy weaponary in exchange for some golden coins. If you didn’t understand what is happening, you definitively should check this out!
